item.title: Scott Orlin Named President of Revived Hollywood Foreign Press Association
item.description: Scott Orlin has been elected president of the newly re-established Hollywood Foreign Press Association, just days after a group of legacy members voted Helen Hoehne out as its president. Hoehne is now
